# amalitech-progress-bar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute       | Description                                                                     | Type                               | Default     |
| --------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `helperText`    | `helper-text`   | Provide a hint to the user of what's happening.                                 | `string`                           | `undefined` |
| `hideLabel`     | `hide-label`    | Hides the label.                                                                | `boolean`                          | `false`     |
| `hideValue`     | `hide-value`    | Hides the value.                                                                | `boolean`                          | `false`     |
| `indeterminate` | `indeterminate` | If `true`, the progress bar will be displayed as an indeterminate progress bar. | `boolean`                          | `false`     |
| `label`         | `label`         | A label describing the progress bar.                                            | `string`                           | `undefined` |
| `maximumValue`  | `maximum-value` | The maximum value.                                                              | `number`                           | `100`       |
| `minimumValue`  | `minimum-value` | The minimum value.                                                              | `number`                           | `0`         |
| `size`          | `size`          |  Possible values are: `"sm"`, `"lg"` and `"md"` in pixel. Defaults to `"sm"`.   | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`             | `'sm'`      |
| `status`        | `status`        | The status of the progress bar.                                                 | `"active" \| "error" \| "success"` | `'active'`  |
| `value`         | `value`         | The current value.                                                              | `number`                           | `0`         |
